title: UFYB 197: Goal Setting Challenges + Solutions: Listener QA
itunes:title: Goal Setting Challenges + Solutions: Listener QA
description:
Do you believe that goals are only worthwhile if they seem extremely challenging? Do you worry about what will happen if you set a goal that is literally impossible to achieve? Do you start out eager to create a new habit and then do a complete 180 and want to rebel against the new “rule” you’ve created for yourself?

 

In this Listener QA episode, I’m working through common challenges that listeners face when setting and working toward their goals. Tune in to learn how to use coaching tools to set great goals and then overcome all your brain’s drama in order to achieve them.

 

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/197

itunes:subtitle: Why you won’t accomplish as much when you go after a goal with resistance.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
